sourcesContent:
import styles from './Create.module.css' import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import * as carService from '../../services/carService.js' import { AuthContext } from '../../context/authContext.js' import { isAuthenticated } from '../../hoc/isAuth.js' import * as validation from './validation.js' const Create = () => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) let history = useHistory() const initialValue = { brand: '', price: '', year: '', category: '', mileage: '', horsePower: '', fuel: '', gearbox: '', color: '', extras: '', description: '', location: '', contactNumber: '', imageUrl: '', error: 'false' } const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(initialValue) const [error, setError] = useState(false) const createSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let formData = new FormData(e.currentTarget) let { brand, price, year, category, mileage, horsePower, fuel, gearbox, color, extras, description, location, contactNumber, imageUrl } = Object.fromEntries(formData) let data = { brand, price, year, category, mileage, horsePower, fuel, gearbox, color, extras, description, location, contactNumber, imageUrl }; carService.create(data, user.accessToken) .then(result => { console.log(result) history.push('/car/catalog') }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } const brandChangeHandler = (e) =>{ let isValid = validation.brand(e.target.value); setErrorMessage(state => ({ ...state, brand: isValid.message })) setError(isValid.error) } const priceChangeHandler = (e) =>{ let isValid = validation.price(e.target.value); setErrorMessage(state => ({ ...state, price: isValid.message })) setError(isValid.error) } const yearChangeHandler = (e) =>{ let isValid = validation.year(e.target.value); setErrorMessage(state => ({ ...state, year: isValid.message })) setError(isValid.error) } const categoryChangeHandler = (e) =>{ console.log(e.target.value) let isValid = validation.category(e.target.value); setErrorMessage(state => ({ ...state, category: isValid.message })) setError(isValid.error) } return (

Create Ad

{errorMessage.brand}
{errorMessage.price}
{errorMessage.year}
{errorMessage.category}
{errorMessage.category}
); } export default isAuthenticated(Create)
